mapper.select: SELECT NO FROM (SELECT CNT, NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, A.* FROM(SELECT B.BOOK_NO AS NO, COUNT(*) CNT FROM BOOK B, ORDERS O, ORDER_BOOK OB WHERE B.BOOK_NO = OB.BOOK_NO AND O.ORDER_NO = OB.ORDER_NO AND O.ORDER_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO) A) WHERE R_NUM <= 8) ORDER BY CNT DESC
SELECT BOOK_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE DESC) A) WHERE R_NUM <= 8

SELECT NO FROM (SELECT CNT, NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, A.* FROM(SELECT B.BOOK_NO AS NO, COUNT(*) CNT FROM BOOK B, ORDERS O, ORDER_BOOK OB WHERE B.BOOK_NO = OB.BOOK_NO AND O.ORDER_NO = OB.ORDER_NO GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO) A) WHERE R_NUM <= 8) ORDER BY CNT DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_START_DATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY GOODS_START_DATE DESC) A) WHERE R_NUM <= 6
